event_text: m_c was climbing a tree when they fell. Luckily, they were only bruised by the incident.
m_c trips over an unseen rabbit hole, spraining their paw.
m_c was pushing through some dense shrubs and felt the branches tear painfully at their pelt.
m_c was climbing a tree and got a splinter from one of the branches.
m_c was moving some branches out of the way when they got a splinter.
m_c was out wandering the territory for a bit too long and came back with frostbite.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died after they got frostbite.

event_text: m_c fell into a river, and inhaled a lot of water before managing to get out. They've been hacking and sputtering ever since.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from water-inhalation after falling in the river.

event_text: m_c's tail was badly injured by a falling tree.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred by a falling tree.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after a tree fell on them.

event_text: A fire rages through the forest. m_c manages to escape, though not unscathed by the experience.

history_text.scar: m_c's pelt was burned by a forest fire.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their burns after a forest fire.

event_text: The dry greenleaf weather leads to a fire bursting to life in camp, dangerously close to the nursery. There's still one kit inside, m_c dives into the den and makes it out, burnt, but with r_c safely swinging in their grasp.

history_text.scar: m_c's pelt was burned by a forest fire.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their burns after a forest fire.

event_text: A fire rages through the forest and m_c manages to escape, though not unscathed by the experience.

history_text.scar: m_c's pelt was burned by a forest fire.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their burns after a forest fire.
